mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (prod_id, opt_prod_id, qty, mem_id) VALUES (#{prod_id}, #{opt_prod_id}, #{qty}, #{mem_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart as c JOIN product as p ON c.prod_id = p.prod_id LEFT JOIN option_product as o ON c.opt_prod_id = o.opt_prod_id AND p.is_opt = 'Y' WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} ORDER BY c.cart_id DESC
